title: The UKâ€™s next Prime Minister will be Rishi Sunak
description: Rishi Sunak wins UK Conservative party leadership contest as only other contender steps down. Also: meeting those living in recently liberated Kherson in Ukraine, Uganda attempts to contain an Ebola outbreak and sheep flood the streets of Spanish capital Madrid.
